title: Textile, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
dimensions:
H x W: 47 x 86.4 cm (18 1/2 x 34 in.)
Repeat H x W: 26 x 20 cm (10 1/4 x 7 7/8 in.)
description: Fragment of printed cotton with a half-dropped repeat of a curving vine with large blossoms in black, blue and two reds on a white ground with black picotage.
